Photos from Recuperma.bvba's post

Family-owned company Bornes Recycalge took delivery of a 1,300-tonne side compression shear Lidex. With this new heavy-duty machine, the scrap metal recycling expert is laying the foundations of its future development.

Some key specs :

▪️Up to 70 t/hour
▪️Full automatic cycle
▪️Ultra-rapid cutting blades replacement system 
▪️Cross head in cast steel for a better resistance

Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations!

LEFORT TRAX 1000

Time for innovation.  the Lefort Trax 1000 will take over the work of the Lefort 900 mobile.

Australia 🇦🇺

A new LEFORT Koloss 1000 TS has joined the ranks at Dalton Metal Recycling

A new Koloss, for a brand new yard for the Dalton Group in Central/Western Glasgow. This yard is brand new and designed to give the best layout for Metal Recycling. The electrically powered (4x110kW) giant of a shear is now in place and ready to further enhance the processing capability of the Dalton Group. The machine is extremely quick, due to the 4 large electric motors and three valve blocks, making it a very strong and productive machine 💪🏽

—

⚙️ 1000T cutting force, Ts box (wraparound), 180T baling ram, 4 x 110 kW electric motors, 8.0m box length, lid force each lid 400T, hold down 200T, loading hopper, window crosshead, platform & cabin, automatic greasing.
Lindborgs bildemontering ab 🇸🇪💪🏽

🇬🇧 Jebb Metals have now put to work their new Koloss 1000 TS. This Lefort shear/baler is proving to be a real head turner as it sits proudly at the top of their yard. 

💥 Delivered to site in three main pieces the machine is assembled on a foundation frame and commissioned within two weeks. The machine is very productive on all grades of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, shearing with the 1000T window crosshead or baling with the 180T baling ram. 

💪🏽 The power, strength and speed of its cutting is giving very pleasing results for its new owners. This machine, fitted with the 600HP Scania diesel engine, operators control cabin and tunnel pusher ram is easily capable of 25-30 Tonnes per hour of production, depending upon material and cut length. 

We wish Philip & Stephen all the best for the future with their new Lefort Koloss 1000 TS 🙌

#LefortUk

💥🎬 [𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨] BORNES RECYCLAGE ramps-up with a new Lidex 1300T !

« Our Lidex can go up to 70t/hr. It has a rail breaker and can handle heavy scrap when needed. In the crane, thanks to the automatic cycle, our operator can prepare the next load while the scrap previously loaded is still being processed. No time is lost ! » Charles Bornes 

M. Bornes also prizes the total cooperation shown throughout the project including the recommendations for the most efficient layout of the machine on site, the supply of the civil engineering guide drawings, the logistic operations, the assembly & commissioning of the machine, not forgetting the training of operators and technicians.

🤝 Thanks again to the Bornes family for their trust.
